clientSide

Interface ChefInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComHandler

    public interface ChefInterface
    Implementing this interface allows a Thread object to act as the Restaurant's Chef.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityStates.ChefState getChefState()
      Getter function to know the Chef's current state.
      boolean setChefState(EntityStates.ChefState newChefState)
      Setter function to update the Chef's state.

    • Method Detail

      • getChefState

        EntityStates.ChefState getChefState()
        Getter function to know the Chef's current state.
        Returns:
        Chef's state

      • setChefState

        boolean setChefState(EntityStates.ChefState newChefState)
        Setter function to update the Chef's state.
        Parameters:
        newChefState - new state to replace Chef's current state
        Returns:
        true if state is changed/updated, false if not
